document_data.mainbody:
Amak was an efreeti guard in the Elemental Plane of Fire in 1373 DR.
Amak was a guard at a mine run by Hafiz al-Milhab in the Elemental Plane of Fire, where efreet put enslaved azers to work. In 1373 DR, the mine was attacked by Kaanyr Vhok and his allies, who had forged an agreement with azer leaders. Kaanyr questioned Amak about the mines defenses and in exchange for information spared his life.
